dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT summary_name ,DECODE(group_name4, 'Creates', 1, 'Updates', 2, 'Deletes', 3) sort ,group_name4 ,SUM(DECODE(group_name2,'BO_API',value,0)) BPEL ,SUM(DECODE(group_name2,'XXCONV',value,0)) Conversion ,SUM(DECODE(group_name2,'XXCONV',0,'BO_API',0,VALUE)) Other ,SUM(value) Total FROM XXCRM.xx_cdh_tca_entity_stat_info WHERE summary_name = DECODE(:pEntity, 'ALL', summary_name, :pEntity) AND TO_DATE(group_name3, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') BETWEEN TO_DATE(:pStdate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(:pEnddate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') GROUP BY summary_name ,group_name4 ORDER BY DECODE(group_name4, 'Creates', 1, 'Updates', 2, 'Deletes', 3)
SELECT :pEntity pEnt ,TO_DATE(:pStdate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') pStart ,TO_DATE(:pEnddate,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') pEnd FROM dual
